CustomField.description: Displays to users whether there is an outstanding validation on the financial product record based on the status of the latest update.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( OW_latest_update__c ), "ERROR: no update linked", IF( ISPICKVAL( OW_latest_update__r.Validated__c, "" ), "Validation pending", "Validated" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells you if there is an outstanding validation on this financial product.
CustomField.label: Validation status
